markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Double Prey](/Feats.aspx?ID=526) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 175 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Bounty Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=52) (Level 14), [Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169) (Level 14)

</column>

---

You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down. When you use the Hunt Prey action, you can pick two creatures as your prey.

<title level="2">Double Prey leads to...</title>
[Shared Prey](/Feats.aspx?ID=531)
name: Double Prey
